data.eml:eml: On three species of the trapdoor spider Genus Cyclocosmia from China (Araneae, Halonoproctidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Kun, Zhang, Zhi-Sheng (2018): On three species of the trapdoor spider Genus Cyclocosmia from China (Araneae, Halonoproctidae). Zootaxa 4532 (2): 248-256, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.2.4
